standByMessage: ヽ(◉◡◔)ﾉ OLA I AM QUIZZBOT I AM LE BOT FOR LE QUIZZ HON HON BAGUETTO ヽ(◉◡◔)ﾉ
requiresToBeOp: This command requires to be OP.
help:
IRC QuizzBot made with NodeJS. https://github.com/Outpox/QuizzBot
Available commands:
!start, !stop, !ask, !top, !stats, !say, !lang
To get help for a specific command: !help command
Ex: !help top
help_start:
Start the quizz if it's not running already.
No parameters.
help_stop:
Stop the quizz if it's running.
No parameters.
help_ask:
Force the quizz to ask the given question.
Takes only one paramater which is the question ID.
Ex: !ask 23
help_top:
Display the user top list. If the user is OP !top is displayed in the channel, else trough PM to the user.
Takes one optional parameter which is the max number of user to display.
Ex: !top
Or: !top 5
help_stats:
Display your own stats in PM. Takes one optional parameter which is a user name of whom we want the stats.
Ex: !stats
Or: !stats username
help_say:
Experimental. Force the bot to say the given message.
Ex: !say hello world
help_lang:
Allows you to configure the bot's language.
Just type !lang <lang>
Available languages:
questionInQuizz: I've got %s questions in my list!
noGoodAnswer: No one found the good answer!
